job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtat cadence we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to make an impact on the world of technology ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtthe candidate will be responsible for designing developing troubleshooting and debugging software programs in the areas of static timing analysis with a focus on delay calculation and signal integrity analysisltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtposition requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe candidate will have demonstrated excellent software engineering skills and must be proficient in cc in a unix environment master degree in ee cs or related area is required phd is preferred strong knowledge of tcl is preferred the candidate must also possess good communication skills and team work skillsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt ltstronggtwere doing work that matters help us solve what others cantltstronggtltstronggt
